com.cloutree.api.config
Class APIConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.cloutree.api.config.APIConfiguration

public class APIConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

APIConfiguration
Class containing static variables to configure the API and its connection to the ClouTree Server.

Author:
marc Since 09.09.2013

Field Summary
static java.lang.String apiPass
          Password of the user configured in apiUser
static java.lang.String apiURL
          URL of the cloutree-server-api, without protocol.
static java.lang.String apiUser
          User which should be used to login at the ClouTree-Server
Note: This user has to have the permission "API" within the server.
static java.lang.String modelEvaluatorServlet
          Name of the servlet responsible for model evaluation.
static boolean SSLEncrypted
          Boolean defining if the server should be addressed SSL-encryted or not.

Field Detail

apiUser

public static java.lang.String apiUser
User which should be used to login at the ClouTree-Server
Note: This user has to have the permission "API" within the server.

apiPass

public static java.lang.String apiPass
Password of the user configured in apiUser

apiURL

public static java.lang.String apiURL
URL of the cloutree-server-api, without protocol.
Example: 'example.cloutree.com:8080/ClouTree/api/'

modelEvaluatorServlet

public static java.lang.String modelEvaluatorServlet
Name of the servlet responsible for model evaluation.
DEFAULT: 'modeleval'

SSLEncrypted

public static boolean SSLEncrypted
Boolean defining if the server should be addressed SSL-encryted or not. For internal networks SSL encryption should be turned off with respect to performance. Conntections over public networks should be encrypted.
